title: Refilling Grain Drill with Pasture Mix/Oats/Red Clover to Reseed Old Pasture

tasks.task: Loading and setting up a drill for reseeding a grass hay pasture
subtasks: Adjusting the depth of gauge wheels
Mixing oats, fescue, timothy seed, and leftover wheat

Planning the amount of seed needed for three to four acres
Utilizing leftover seed from the previous spring
Preparing clover seed (medium red and frosty berseem) for planting
Managing remaining spring wheat (11 bags out of 295) for potential sale
Arranging the grain card and trailer for subsequent projects

tasks.task: Preparing to plant corn in two weeks
subtasks: Storing corn on a pallet for upcoming planting
